caption: Play Console - App overview. Shows app name and dashboard.
API access - Add or grant service account access for CI uploads.
Create release - choose Internal testing, then create a new release.
Upload AAB - drag & drop your generated .aab file here.
Release notes & validations - add notes and review any validation warnings or errors.
Start rollout - confirm and start rollout to internal testers.
Testers - add testers or copy the opt-in URL to invite testers.
Pre-launch report - monitor automated test results and crashes.
Production rollout - promote release to production when ready.
